text.section: An applicant for a school bus endorsement shall take a driving skills test in a school bus of the same vehicle group as the school bus the applicant will drive.

law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 21, sec. 5, effective June 25, 2013. -- Created 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 165, sec. 1, effective June 20, 2005.
